英文WIKI0.8版本

0.8.0[1]
Additions:
Blocks:
Pumpkins[2]
Birch and Spruce Planks, Slabs, and Stairs[3]
Rails[4]
Powered Rails (always powered)[5]
Cobblestone Walls [6]
Iron Bars [7]
Creative-Only Blocks:
Possibly Ice[8]
Sponge[3]
Jungle Planks, Slabs, and Stairs[3]
Farmable:
Carrots[9]
Potatoes[9]
Pumpkins[2]
Items:
Minecarts
Redstone (mineable and used to craft, but can't be used as Redstone dust until after 0.9.0) [10]
Foods:
Pumpkin Pie[2]
Pumpkin Seeds[2]
Carrots[9]
Potatoes[9]
Tweaks:
Improvements to Creative Inventory:
New Creative Menu along with new blocks [11]
Flint and Steel in creative inventory.[12]
World Generation:
Improved the terrain.png file, making it possible to add more blocks.
Options:
Far render distance [13]
Controls:
Possibly new Controls which can allow Sneaking and Sprinting.[14]
Mobs:
Mob AI System (Mobs will swim over deep water, and hostile mobs will be more intelligent)[15]
Blocks:
Redstone Ore now drops Redstone Dust when mined
Fire and lava will now ignite TNT.[16]
Sideways pointing wood blocks [17]
Inventory:
Possibly new survival inventory
Transparent hotbar[18]
Graphics:
Shadows now move depending on the position of the Sun (exclusive feature)[19]
Tommaso said on Reddit that "it looks bad", and thus may not be added.[20]
Lighter colored Water and Sky [21]
The sea fades to non-transparent in the distance[13][22]
Improved sky color[23]
Possibly smooth day-to-night transitions and tinted lighting[20]
3D Clouds [13]
Textures:
Changed Gravel texture from to .[13]
Changed Birch Leaves texture from to . [13]
Mipmaps and anisotropic filtering [13]
Bug Fixes: [hide]
MCPE-347: Weird textures: Moiré pattern on bricks
MCPE-61: Water flows downward next to farmland
MCPE-2804: Fire doesn't ignite TNT
MCPE-4736: Spiders have no abdomen
MCPE-4887: Skeleton missing lower part of body
MCPE-5359: Blocks in hand have no backface culling
MCPE-1524: Graphical glitch when looking down above clouds
MCPE-5411: Falling in creative on world load

英文WIKI0.9版本

0.9.0[24]
Additions:
Blocks:
Non-solid blocks:
Tall grass[25]
Generated Structures
Caves
World Generation:
World Sizes [26]
All of them will be bigger than the current size (256x256)
Option to toggle infinite worlds, displaying a warning when selected.
Option to select if your world is finite or infinite, have multiple finite sizes.
Realms will only be able to be generated with a finite size.
New Biomes: [27]
All the biomes as of PC version 1.7, excluding the more resource-intensive ones such as jungles and roofed forests.
Maybe a switch for more resource-intensive biomes. [28]
Forests will have less leaves and grass
Possibly a few version-exclusive biomes
Plans to port Minecraft PC world generation, potentially allowing for infinite worlds, generated structures (villages, caves, etc.), and increased world height.[29]
Recently failed to port PC world generation
Tweaks:
New World Options:
Option to toggle Caves [30]
Option to toggle tall grass [31]
Option to make your world a limited size or infinite
Several sizes for limited size

中文0.9翻译：

0.9.0 [ 24 ]

添加：

方块：

非固体方块：

高草[ 25 ]

生成的结构

洞穴

世界一代：

世界大小[ 26 ]

所有的人都将超过目前的大小（纹理）

选择切换无限的世界，显示一个警告时

选择你的世界是有限的还是无限的，有多个有限尺寸。

服务器将只会与一个有限大小的产生。

新的生物群系：[ 27 ]

所有的生物群落作为PC版本1.7，不包括更多的过于密集的丛林和屋顶的森林。

也许有更多的资源密集的生物群落的开关。28。

森林将有更少的树叶和草

可能有一些独家版本的生物群落

计划港口Minecraft PC世界生成，可能允许无限的世界，产生的结构（村子，洞穴等），和增加了世界上的高度。[ 29 ]

最近没有端口的PC世界的一代

调整：

新世界的选项：

选择切换洞穴[ 30 ]

选择切换高草[ 31 ]

选项使你的世界规模有限或无限

有限大小的几个尺寸




机翻的还有点……

未来展望：

080和090分别实现了画面和世界

从090更新可以看到，Pe版将有像Pc版1.7一样的生物群系！对所有机子是一个挑战

090过后可能是几个小更新，但明年，Pe将进入Beta版时代，期待。
